direction.raw_text: I always thought that plateau up there could be for a house someday. I thought about remaining here, letting the rest of humanity run off to Mars. And we'd just stay here. Jack stops himself, realizing how easily he said "we."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. Jack...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. He moves away from her, lights the fire, it starts to crackle. He gets up and goes, walking down to the lake. She stands near the fire, glad for its warmth, watching him out there, silhouetted in front of the lake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He stares out over the water. Letting the truth wash over him. And then MUSIC from the grotto... the opening bars to the Temptation's "My Girl."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GROTTO, CRATER LAKE -- NIGHT Julia stands by the record player, watching the disc revolve. She looks up when Jack's form appears in the doorway. He's been out there too long, cold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He loved this song. Jack sits, shivering, looking out at the lake. She moves to him, wraps a blanket around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was he like?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was arrogant, and annoying, and the best man I'd ever known. Some distant part of Jack smiles at that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .And I loved him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not that man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shhhhh. Yes you are. She rests her head against on his shoulder, holds him. Simple, caring. His eyes... close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A group of ASTRONAUTS and NASA CONTROLLERS are celebrating. A television screen reads: "Odyssey Mission a GO!"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and JULIA are among the people celebrating. As an ASTRONAUT pops champagne, Jack and Julia find a private alcove, he lifts out the engagement ring that she wears on the necklace around her neck...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We should just tell everybody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, when we come home... They KISS...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A DARK ROOM - NIGHT Their bodies entwined. Kissing, touching. Clothing pulled away. Staring into each other's eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Younger Jack stares out the window at the Odyssey on its launchpad in the distance. Steam rolls off its engines. It's being readied to launch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey... He looks over, smiles. She's naked under the sheets, happy, smiling back at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack's eyes blink open. Julia is asleep near him, peaceful. He turns, stares into the lightening morning sky. The Tet rising with the sun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CRATER LAKE -- MORNING Jack walks to the water's edge. He stares at the reflection of the Tet in the glassy surface of the lake. And under that, a fish, nibbling algae... He smiles at the fish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S. ) Good morning. He turns. She's there, arms held around herself against the chill of morning. They look at each other, so much to be said.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can't stay here. She smiles, nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack and Julia fly low over terrain. As the Bubbleship crests a rise and drops down into a steep canyon, she takes his hand. He glances at her, lets his hand stay in hers. The entrance to Raven Rock looms ahead... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His eyes narrow. There's SMOKE, drifting from inside Raven Rock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the Bubbleship touches down, the carnage becomes clear. A few shattered DRONES lie here and there, but there are bodies and smoking blast points everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: grabs his carbine, heading inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay here...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Jack moves into the darkness of the ruined Raven Rock, his suit's lights blaze on. He moves in, weapon ready. Bodies are everywhere, blasted to pieces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: still burn here and there. Paint bubbles on burning canvas. Records melt and drip in the heat... Jack turns a corner, finds Sykes STARING AT HIM! But his eyes are dead. Sykes still holds a spear implanted in a Drone's wrecked body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: draws Jack's attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is slumped in a chair, blastburnt, clutching a charred black box in his arms. His eyes half-lidded, he
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Newsreel footage, from when the Tet arrived. On the screen crowds stare, the UN meets, Cults form.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in the sky, its surface VIBRATES, then starts to come apart. People SCREAM... Cutting to War Footage. Alien Troop-ships touching down, their design distinctly Tet-like. They discharge waves of warriors...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON: Hand held, war-journalism. We see the alien soldiers pushing back resistance. All of them are versions of Jack. One sights the cameraman, BLAM! Blows him away. Camera hits dirt..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Jack is there next to Beech. He's just pushed the projector over. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (not looking up) The first ones were soldiers, programmed only to kill. Beech slowly, painfully, looks at him. Little emotion in Beech, just resigned recognition.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Later, there were new versions. More... creative. The Tet needed something different. And finally there was... you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm the weapon of this war.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: smiles sardonic, nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Tet. The clockmaker God. Such brilliant, complex machinery... For such a simple task. To steal our water, our life... all for fuel. (BEAT) It doesn't even care about us. It's just... effective.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why didn't you tell me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not the kind of news that. (coughing up blood) .motivates a man. Beat,then low, defeated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We lost, Jack. It won.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The device...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shaking his head) No Drone. It will go on, devouring world, after world... (BEAT) You like books, Jack. Beech closes his eyes, recalling from memory... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Cowards die many times before their deaths; The valient never taste of death but once." Beech's voice trails off... Jack kneels in front of Beech. The old man's eyes are open, fixed on the artwork, the remnants of humanity... But they don't blink any longer. Beech is dead. Jack reaches up, closes Beech's eyes. He removes the box from Beech's arms: The flight recorder from the odyssey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is a way. Julia stands in the doorway to the library.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wants me. Bring me to it. (off his silence) I'm right. You know I am. It's the only way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The room destroyed. The disassembled Drone a smoking hulk. Jack works in front of an open Delta Sleep Pod from the Odyssey. He HAULS the cylindrical BOMB to the Pod, slots it into the space for personal effects...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it ready? Julia is standing at the entrance to the room. He nods and she approaches, STARES at what will be her coffin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julia...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's just do it. She moves to climb in, then turns to Jack and kisses him. It's a kiss filled with a lifetime of kisses missed. Finally, it breaks. She backs away, into the Pod, next to the BOMB. Trembling as the door starts to CLOSE. Suddenly, she's very scared. Fighting back panic. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack... Jack!! The door closes, SEALS. Jack stares down at her through the carapace. He puts a hand on the glass. She puts hers on the other side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .I got this. He touches a button and a pale gas starts to fill the chamber. Julia realizes that this will be her last moment of consciousness. Trembling, crying, afraid...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack... And she falls asleep. Jack stares at her sleeping form.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dream about us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wind tearing at him, JACK loads the sleep pod onto the drone-carrier of the Bubbleship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BUBBLESHIP, OUTTER ATMOSPHERE - LATER The Bubbleship hovers high above the clouds, the Delta Pod attached beneath it. Jack STARES down at the earth. He hits a control and the ship rotates, so it's facing upwards towards the Tet which fills the sky above. Jack touches the throttle and the Bubbleship begins to CLIMB. Jack has the odyssey flight recorder on the seat next to him. He touches a control and THE AUDIO fills the canopy. It's distant, fuzzy, recorded from deep space. Jack listens as the Tet grows in size in front of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning folks, this is captain Jack Harper here in the cockpit. We're settling in at a cool one hundred and fifty clicks from the unidentified flying object...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ORIGINAL JACK in the Pilot's seat, ORIGINAL VICTORIA next to him, co-piloting. Jack GRINS as he peers out at the Tet, just a small geometry among the stars...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Mission Control) So far, from this distance, we're still reading zero heat signatures, no sign of organic life. Did I mention we're still really far away?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mission plan has us approaching to one hundred kilometers, doing our initial readouts...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, because everyone knows, if you want to really know something, one hundred kilometers is the best
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop. We don't know what it is, if it has intentions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Mission Control) I think she just made my point -- INT. BUBBLESHIP 2 - CONTINUOUS (PRESENT) Jack touches a control, the sound from the recorder FAST FORWARDS. Hours and hours of time on the odyssey fly by. The Bubbleship has reached the stratosphere where the blue sky gives way to black space. We see the small ship detach from the blue curve of earth, the blackness of space in front of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bob, let's prep for outer atmosphere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the Bubbleship starts to transform for outer space as it RISES higher and higher... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a metallic voice) Technician Harper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Finally. There you are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your ship has converted to space mode. This is not authorized.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am delivering the survivor from the crash of the NASA ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Tet reflected in his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are... a more effective team.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .Proceed. Jack... exhales. The TINY BUBBLESHIP climbs towards the massive artificial moon as the audio from the flight recorder surrounds him again...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't know if we're dealing with E.T. or the Klingons here, and we're not going to from this distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SPACE SHUTTLE ODYSSEY NO TIME (FLASHBACK) The ORIGINAL JACK and ORIGINAL VICTORIA, in a friendly argument.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It could be inert. Anything on it could be long gone by now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which is why we need to make contact, before it just blows on by like some...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which is why we need to make contact. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He double-takes, relieved that she finally agrees with him, smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Mission Control) I agree with Commander Harper. It crossed whatever light years of space and time to come this close to us. We're not going to really know anything about it from this far away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack sits in the Bubbleship, the Tet looming above, the voices surrounding him.., remembering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They must have been given clearance to approach, because the Tet now FILLS the view in front of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mission control says maintain one thousand meters. Original Jack touches a control. The Shuttle pushes forward, a little.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a once in a lifetime opportunity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have our orders, Jack. We're to let it proceed without -- ORIGINAL JACK We are. We're going to let it proceed whereever it's going... He lifts out of his seat, floats back towards the mid- section of the Shuttle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's already pulling on a spacesuit. Near him is the row of Delta Sleep Pods. In the nearest one, he can see Julia, asleep. He puts his hand on the glass...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be right back...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are we really going to do this? He looks over. original Victoria is already pulling on her spacesuit... A last glance back at Julia, then he turns away. He smiles at Victoria, drifts next to her, pulling out a small camera and pointing it back at the two of them...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's make history.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The birth of the picture of the two of them, eyes filled with anticipation. The photo in Jack's locker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The shuttle airlock cracks. Two figures in Space Suits emerge. Small puffs of gas, they head towards...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Tet MASSIVE in front of them. Their small forms shrinking at they approach it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . His face seen through his visor as they approach. Filled with wonder. The dark shadow of the Tet crossing over him, blacking out everything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BUBBLE SHIP 2 --- CONTINUOUS PRESENT Our Jack sits at the controls, the Tet now similarly massive in front of him, blotting out all other sight. He glances at the Bobblehead, which trembles from the ship's engines.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay Bob, I'm scared too. In front of him, a SLOT opens in the Tet wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enter at headway speed only. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Entering at headway speed. He flies into the Tet, carrying the POD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The TET is obviously of alien manufacture. In this huge bay, other BUBBLESHIPS are being constructed, welded together, by Drones. JACK drifts above all of this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave the survivor and return to your duties. Breathable atmosphere has been provided.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is illuminated for Jack to land.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Understood. Jack continues on, towards a huge DOOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave the survivor and return to your duties.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (touching a control) You know, you made a mistake, Tet. You left me curious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Reverse course. Leave the -- JACK And right now, I want to see what you're made of... Jack GUNS his ship at the large doors, OPENING UP with canons as he does. In front of him, the door IMPLODES just as Jack's ship reaches it, passing into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: space, miles in every direction. Jack's ships
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: along walls that pulse with energy... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you like books, Tet!? I like books. Can I tell you something that I read?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DRONES detach from the walls of the Tet, beginning pursuit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a story from Rome, a very great city, that you destroyed. The Bubbleship hauls over, headed deeper into the Tet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drone 166 sits inert in the sand where we last saw it. Now it RISES UP with a familiar and evil sound. It moves off, searching...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: s flies as never before. Drone fire reaching him! Blasts IMPACT the Bubbleship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There was a guy named Horatius... and he held a bridge, alone. And when they told him to run, to give up, he said -- BOOM! A drone blast EXPLODES A whole engine of the ship. The Bubbleship goes into an uncontrollable SPIN, headed straight at a WALL...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He said everybody dies. The thing is, to die well...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Jack's ship IMPACTS the wall, goes halfway through. The Canopy SHATTERS. Glass and debris tear at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack STUMBLES OUT, badly wounded. He drags the pod off the carrier. He looks around himself, sees: (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of EMPTY GLASS PODS. He tracks the walls, until near him... there are a dozen with Jack and Victoria clones still inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drones BLAST away from behind the Bubbleship. Jack stares at the clones, LAUGHS morbidly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .What Horatius said, what his argument was, was this... He opens the pod, revealing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and on his chest the raw BOMB. The nuclear warhead from the odyssey surrounded by ten Deuterium fuel cells.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is not the Survivor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Drones blast away the last bit of the Bubbleship, push through...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Delta Sleep Pod rests in front of Jack's ruined Grotto, near the lake's edge. A TIMER now reaches ZERO. The Delta Pod unseals with a HISSS, its door opening. Soft daylight falls on Julia's face. Her eyes move under their lids, then flicker open..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack sees the DRONES swarming towards him. He starts to recite, but falters. He's really scared.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can a man die...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CRATER LAKE - CONTINUOUS Julia emerges from the Pod, confused, looking around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She sees the metal cylinder, releases it and it tumbles to the ground. She crouches by it, opens it. Whatever she sees moves her to tears as IN FRONT OF HER, the form of Drone 166 rises into view. Its weapons trained on her. She looks up, right at it, resigned...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the Drones swarm down, Jack closes his eyes, recites without embellishment. The way these words were meant to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can man die better Than facing fearful odds, For the ashes of his fathers, And the temples of his gods... The DRONES are on him, weapons lining!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you hear me!!! Jack pounds the trigger with his fist. As ALL THE CLONES open their eyes. .and everything is bathed in WHITE LIGHT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Tet explodes in a MASSIVE DEUTERIUM FISSION EXPLOSION, the entire artificial moon killed from within.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: falls inert in front of Julia as the Tet Explodes in the sky above her. She stares up, tears already running down her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fall from the sky, powerless...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: losing power, and falls ponderously into what remains of the sea...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CRATER LAKE. CONTINUOUS The explosion is like St Elmo's fire, refracted across the sky, all over the face of the earth. Julia looks down at her hands which hold: A rolled canvas, the only object inside the metal cylinder. She unrolls it now. We glimpse a girl lying in golden fields, a farmhouse in the distance. The painting from Ravens Rock that reminded her of home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: weeping, staring at the fire ball in the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well-tended. Thick ripe fruit hang on vines.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) The Tet arrived almost half a century ago. And it changed our world forever... We're at CRATER LAKE, three years in the future. The Grotto has been turned into a house, the ground has been cultivated. Roses and yellow flowers grow near the house. A SOLAR ARRAY powers the spot. All Jack's scavenging has gone to very good use. There's a small make-shift boat moored at the Lake's edge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) It was probably surprised, what we were willing to do, to survive. Jack's basketball sits alone near the hoop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) We had to unlearn what it meant, to call something our home. There's a familiar painting, hanging on the wall. The girl in the field of wheat, yearning towards home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) But we did. We started over. And so here we are now, everyone that's left... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is turning over a patch of ground for next year. Next to her, A CHILD is digging her fingers through loam. The CHILD looks up, stares across the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, almost everyone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands at the edge of the water, on the opposite side. He wears the wrecked remains of a worksuit, and carries a pack. It is Jack 2. He's aged three years, his hair has grown, his boots are scavenged. He has travelled a long way, and we know that as he stares across the water, he knows exactly what he is looking at.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is that?
direction.name: direction
